description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) because it does not validate or sanitize the 'filename' parameter, which is used directly in 'fs.createWriteStream(filename)'. An attacker could provide a path to a sensitive file, potentially overwriting it. The function is also vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (CWE-918) because it makes a HTTP request to a URL constructed from unsanitized input ('getArchiveName()'). If an attacker can control the output of 'getArchiveName()', they could force the server to make a request to an arbitrary URL. Lastly, the function does not properly validate the status code of
